last_episode_to_air.name: Baby Lullaby
last_episode_to_air.overview: Baby Lullaby takes your baby on a soothing journey with classical lullabies by Bach, Brahms and Mozart. Enjoy relaxing ocean waves, sweet puppet shows and tranquil images. From fun time to rest time, Baby Lullaby is the perfect way to spend special time with your baby.

name: Baby Einstein Classics
overview: Baby Lullaby takes your baby on a soothing journey with classical lullabies by Bach, Brahms and Mozart. Enjoy relaxing ocean waves, sweet puppet shows and tranquil images. From fun time to rest time, Baby Lullaby is the perfect way to spend special time with your baby

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As little ones grow, so does their awareness of the world around them. In this season, discover and learn about animals, starting with the ones that your children may encounter at home, to farm animals, all the way to the most unique of creatures from all 7 continents!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: For young children, the world is bursting with wild and exciting new experiences. Season 2 organizes these ideas and concepts with each fun episode. From numbers and shapes to seasons and colors, little ones will enjoy a playful and stimulating introduction!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: This season is all about the skills that will help your babies begin to communicate. From exploring sounds, music and movement to hearing new and interesting languages, your little mover and shaker will encounter a treasure trove of ways to express themselves.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Only the best! Season 4 treats your child to the very best of classical, holiday and bedtime music. Discover the beauty and magic of sounds as your child dives into Bach, Brahms, Mozart, Beethoven and more.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Discover the world of language! Season 5 stokes your little ones' curiosity by introducing them to letters, sight words and signs. Gently awaken your child's interests in verbal and non-verbal communication.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: There are masterpieces wherever we look! In season 6, your little explorer will journey from the oceans to our sun and far beyond with only the best of tour guides: Da Vinci, Galileo and Neptune!

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: And they're off! Now that your youngster is starting to move independently, explore other means of transport. Let's sing, dance and play as we travel around the globe using cars, boats airplanes and more. On their journey through season 7 they'll uncover the sights, sounds and rhythms of the world.

episodes.name: Animals Around Me
episodes.overview: Set off on a fun-filled "field trip" with your baby to discover animals found at the park, on the farm, and in your own backyard - whether furry or feathered, winged or wiggly, bumpy or cuddly. Animals Around Me will delight you and your child.

episodes.name: Baby Dolittle: Neighborhood Animals
episodes.overview: As babies continue to explore the world around them, they soon encounter many creatures, both large and small, that are extremely intriguing. Whether furry or feathered, winged or wiggly, bumpy or smooth, each holds a special fascination. Neighborhood Animals exposes little ones to animals most likely to be found close to home or in easily recognized environments.

episodes.name: Baby Dolittle: World Animals
episodes.overview: As each day passes, babies' awareness of the world around them -- and all the wonders it holds -- continues to develop. Wild animals are especially intriguing and World Animals captures the spirit of little ones' fascination with wild creatures as it introduces them to animals living in the jungle, in the ocean, and on the savannah.

episodes.name: Baby MacDonald: A Day On the Farm
episodes.overview: As little ones' curiosity about the world blossoms, you can help sow the seeds of discovery with Baby MacDonald: A Day on the Farm. Featuring live-action images, nursery rhymes and fun-filled puppet shows, this playful, interactive program introduces little ones to the exciting sights and sounds of a real working farm.

episodes.name: Baby Noah: Animal Expedition
episodes.overview: As little ones become better acquainted with the world, they grow curious about animals of all kinds, beyond just the family pet. And as their communication skills continue to develop, they enjoy imitating animal sounds as well. Baby Noah™ Animal Expedition takes your little explorer across the globe from the savannah, the rainforest and tropics, the Outback, the ocean and the Polar Regions.

episodes.name: Wild Animal Safari
episodes.overview: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

episodes.name: World Animal Adventure
episodes.overview: Meet dozens of exotic animals including Asian pandas, Australian kangaroos and Arctic snow monkeys. Rhythms and songs inspired by faraway lands have been orchestrated especially for little ears and encourage your baby to sing, dance and play to the world beats. You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals. It's an exciting world to discover together!

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: As little ones grow, so does their awareness of the world around them. In this season, discover and learn about animals, starting with the ones that your children may encounter at home, to farm animals, all the way to the most unique of creatures from all 7 continents!

episodes.name: Baby Einstein: Numbers Nursery
episodes.overview: Between 12 and 24 months, little ones become increasingly interested in more complex ideas and begin to explore numbers and counting. Numbers Nursery introduces little ones to numerals 1 through 5 in a captivating, interactive way that invites them to join in, clap their hands and count out loud.

episodes.name: Baby Monet: Discovering the Seasons
episodes.overview: As babies grow and change, so does the landscape around them. Every season of the year has its own special magic just waiting to be discovered. Baby Monet takes little ones on a sight-and-sound-filled journey through the seasons using playful puppet shows, images of nature, children, and masterpieces by Claude Monet set to excerpts from composer Antonio Vivaldi's timeless "The Four Seasons."

episodes.name: Baby Newton: All About Shapes
episodes.overview: With Van Gogh, Dolittle, and other Baby programs under their belts, the tots will sidle up to Baby Newton expecting a similar exploration of building blocks to brilliance, but this time there's a wrinkle or two. Animation makes its first appearance, and parents steeped in keep-it-simple culture may object to the springy "I Know My Shapes" song, a departure from classical-only video predecessors.

episodes.name: Discovering Shapes: Circles, Squares, and More
episodes.overview: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. Discovering Shapes playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: For young children, the world is bursting with wild and exciting new experiences. Season 2 organizes these ideas and concepts with each fun episode. From numbers and shapes to seasons and colors, little ones will enjoy a playful and stimulating introduction!

episodes.name: Baby's Favorite Places: First Words Around Town
episodes.overview: As babies turn one year old, they continue to develop their communication skills. Meanwhile, with you as their guide, they also begin to explore the world beyond their front door. Baby's Favorite Places presents them with a playful introduction to 20 words for the names of familiar locations from the market, to the library, to the local park.

episodes.name: Baby's First Moves: Get Up and Go
episodes.overview: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. Baby's First Moves is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

episodes.name: Baby's First Sounds: Discoveries for Little Ears
episodes.overview: Perhaps the sweetest sounds you'll ever hear are the babbles and coos that one day become ma-ma, da-da and I love you. These baby steps of language change everything as your little one discovers an exciting, powerful new way of relating to the world! Baby's First Sounds invites both of you to share these memorable moments: those precious "firsts" that come around once in your baby's lifetime.

episodes.name: Meet the Orchestra: First Instruments
episodes.overview: At 12 months, babies can identify specific sounds, and they're also starting to match the sounds they hear with the objects that make them. Meet the Orchestra: First Instruments presents your little "maestro" with a playful introduction to the sights and sounds of a real orchestra -- from the clashing of cymbals to the purring of the cello and everything in between!

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: This season is all about the skills that will help your babies begin to communicate. From exploring sounds, music and movement to hearing new and interesting languages, your little mover and shaker will encounter a treasure trove of ways to express themselves.

episodes.name: Baby Bach: Musical Adventure
episodes.overview: As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child to the delights of Baby Bach™ Musical Adventure, a program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

episodes.name: Baby Beethoven: Symphony of Fun
episodes.overview: Early on in babies' development, they begin to recognize primary colors such as blue, red, and yellow. All the while, they're also processing an infinite variety of new sights and sounds. Featuring timeless works by one of the world's greatest composers, this exciting musical journey exposes infants to classical music while presenting them with vibrant, baby-friendly images.

episodes.name: Baby Lullaby
episodes.overview: Baby Lullaby takes your baby on a soothing journey with classical lullabies by Bach, Brahms and Mozart. Enjoy relaxing ocean waves, sweet puppet shows and tranquil images. From fun time to rest time, Baby Lullaby is the perfect way to spend special time with your baby.

episodes.name: Baby Mozart: Music Festival
episodes.overview: Baby Mozart™ is an introduction to Mozart's beautiful music, which has been proven to have positive effects on people of all ages, especially babies. Images of brightly colored toys and known objects aid in the audio presentation of child-friendly arrangements and sound effects.

episodes.name: Lullaby Time: Soothing Sounds for Baby
episodes.overview: One of the greatest joys you'll ever experience is bonding with your baby during those calm, quiet moments. Lullaby Time: Soothing Sounds for Baby provides comforting sights and sounds as you relax and share this precious downtime.

episodes.name: Baby Santa's Music Box
episodes.overview: Sharing the joys and traditions of the holiday season with your little one is one of the greatest gifts of parenthood, and Baby Santa's™ Music Box makes this magical time even more special! Celebrate by treating your baby and yourself to a wonderland of bright lights, sparkling ornaments, sleigh bells, toys, winter scenes, jolly Santas and more -- all accompanied by beloved holiday melodies.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Only the best! Season 4 treats your child to the very best of classical, holiday and bedtime music. Discover the beauty and magic of sounds as your child dives into Bach, Brahms, Mozart, Beethoven and more.

episodes.name: Baby Einstein: Language Nursery
episodes.overview: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

episodes.name: Baby Shakespeare: World of Poetry
episodes.overview: Baby's innate curiosity about all they see and hear increases on a daily basis. Baby Shakespeare™ presents little ones with 12 common words that can be found within the rich context of classic poems and the beauty of nature. Stimulating images and the glorious music of Ludwig van Beethoven provides countless opportunities for you and your baby to interact as you explore the world together!

episodes.name: Baby Wordsworth: First Words Around the House
episodes.overview: As their communication skills continue to develop, little ones begin to recognize common words and may point to objects when these items are named. Baby Wordsworth taps into your little one's natural curiosity and introduces 30 words from around the home -- both spoken and in sign language. This engaging program presents little ones with familiar objects in the kitchen, playroom, yard and more.

episodes.name: My First Signs: See and Sign With Baby
episodes.overview: As babies grow, their eye-hand coordination begins to improve as their ability to interact with their surroundings blossoms. It is the perfect time for My First Signs, A playful introduction to 20 common words and phrases from baby's world -- including "mommy", "daddy" and "I love you" -- both Spoken and in Sign Language.

episodes.name: World of Words
episodes.overview: Join our playful puppet host, Bard the Dragon, on a fun-filled adventure using everyday words such as flower, cat, and moon, and beautiful scenery from nature. World Of Words lets you and your little one share the excitement of discovering new words together!

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Discover the world of language! Season 5 stokes your little ones' curiosity by introducing them to letters, sight words and signs. Gently awaken your child's interests in verbal and non-verbal communication.

episodes.name: Baby Da Vinci: From Head to Toe
episodes.overview: From the day their eyes open, babies begin to observe new things around the world. Baby Da Vinci™ From Head to Toe presents them with a playful and interactive introduction to the human body in three languages -- English, Spanish, and French. With a whimsical blend of adorable puppets, children and animals, and famous works of art, this captivating program also features upbeat classical music.

episodes.name: Baby Galileo: Discovering the Sky
episodes.overview: As little ones grow, their innate sense of wonder grows too, creating an occasion for celebration with each new discovery. Baby Galileo™ Discovering the Sky introduces them to that remarkable canopy above us: the sun and moon, fluffy clouds, shimmering stars, colorful planets and whirling galaxies.

episodes.name: Baby Neptune: Discovering Water
episodes.overview: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. Baby Neptune™ exposes little ones to the wonders of water in their world -- whether they're stomping in the rain, splashing in the bathtub, or "meeting" the fascinating creatures that live in rivers, lakes and oceans.

episodes.name: Neptune's Oceans
episodes.overview: Dive in with your little explorer across the seas to meet amazing animals living in the ocean, coral reef, and polar regions. Overflowing with underwater footage of whales, dolphins, tropical fish, and more, Neptune's Oceans invites you and your baby on an oceanic voyage of discovery!

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: There are masterpieces wherever we look! In season 6, your little explorer will journey from the oceans to our sun and far beyond with only the best of tour guides: Da Vinci, Galileo and Neptune!

episodes.name: On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring
episodes.overview: As little ones become increasingly mobile, their fascination with all things that move intensifies too. On the Go Riding Sailing and Soaring exposes babies to the different ways people travel -- on land, by sea, and in the air -- while it presents them with captivating real-world images, funny puppet shows, and beautiful classical music by Beethoven, Haydn, Mozart and Rossini.

episodes.name: World Music
episodes.overview: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

episodes.name: World of Colors
episodes.overview: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

episodes.name: World of Rhythm
episodes.overview: Your little one will want to keep a beat, snap his fingers and march his feet! Join new characters Pillie, the musical woodpecker, and Coco, the dancing cockatoo, and share the excitement of rhythm with your baby. World of Rhythm explores rhythm in music, rhythm in nature and rhythm as a form of expression.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: And they're off! Now that your youngster is starting to move independently, explore other means of transport. Let's sing, dance and play as we travel around the globe using cars, boats airplanes and more. On their journey through season 7 they'll uncover the sights, sounds and rhythms of the world.
